Sylph/Core/Any.h

00001 /* 
00002  * File:   Any.h
00003  * Author: frank
00004  *
00005  * Created on 22 maart 2009, 16:40
00006  */
00007 
00008 #ifndef ANY_H_
00009 #define ANY_H_
00010 
00011 #include "Object.h"
00012 #include "Exception.h"
00013 
00014 #include <typeinfo>
00015 
00016 SYLPH_START_NAMESPACE(Core)
00017 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00018 class Any : public Object {
00019     template<class T> friend T & any_cast(Any & any);
00020 public:
00021 
00022     Any() : content(NULL) {}
00023     template<class T>
00024     Any(const T & value) : content(new AnyContainer<T>(value)) {}
00025     Any(const Any & other) : content(other.content ?
00026           other.content->clone() : 0) {}
00027     ~Any() { delete content; }
00028 
00029     bool empty() { return !content; }
00030     const std::type_info & type() const {
00031         return content ? content->type() : typeid(void);
00032     }
00033 
00034 
00035     Any & operator=(const Any & rhs) {
00036         this->content = rhs.content;
00037     }
00038     template<class T>
00039     Any & operator=(T & value) {
00040         delete this->content;
00041         this->content = new AnyContainer<T>(value);
00042     };
00043 private:
00044 
00045     class AnyContainerBase {
00046     public:
00047 
00048         virtual ~AnyContainerBase() {
00049         }
00050         virtual const std::type_info & type() const = 0;
00051         virtual AnyContainerBase * clone() const = 0;
00052     };
00053 
00054     template<class T>
00055     class AnyContainer : public AnyContainerBase {
00056     public:
00057 
00058         holder(const T & value) : held(value) {
00059         }
00060 
00061         virtual const std::type_info & type() const {
00062             return typeid (T);
00063         }
00064 
00065         virtual AnyContainerBase * clone() const {
00066             return new holder(held);
00067         }
00068 
00069         T held;
00070 
00071     private:
00072         AnyContainer & operator=(const AnyContainer &);
00073 
00074     };
00075 
00076     AnyContainerBase * content;
00077 };
00078 
00079 template<class T> T & any_cast(Any & any) {
00080     check_nullptr(any.contents);
00081     if(!any->type() == typeid(T)) sthrow(InvalidTypeError,
00082             "Tried to assign an Any to an invalid type!");
00083     return static_cast<Any::AnyContainer<T> *>(any.content)->held
00084 }
00085 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE(Core)
00086 
00087 #endif  /* ANY_H_ */
